description: [Dragonfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0035) has gathered hashed user credentials over SMB using spearphishing attachments with external resource links and by modifying .LNK file icon resources to collect credentials from virtualized systems.(Citation: US-CERT TA18-074A)(Citation: Gigamon Berserk Bear October 2021)
